de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp

Class POSUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.POSUtils

  • public class POSUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper around Parts of Speech as assigned by tagger or parser to ensure easy adaptability to a new tagest or language.
    Author:
    kesslewd

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  POSUtils.POSCategory
      category according to universal tagset (Petrov et al.

      • checkMapping

        private static boolean checkMapping(POSUtils.POSCategory category,
                                    java.lang.String pos)
        Checks whether the given String POS is in the given category.
        Parameters:
        pos - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        category - Our categories.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the pos is in the category, FALSE otherwise.

      • isNounPOS

        public static boolean isNounPOS(java.lang.String pos)
        Checks if the given Part of Speech is from the category Noun (NN*).
        Parameters:
        pos - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        Returns:
        TRUE if this is a noun (defined by POSCategory.NOUN).

      • isAdjectivePOS

        public static boolean isAdjectivePOS(java.lang.String pos)
        Checks if the given Part of Speech is from the category Adjective (JJ*).
        Parameters:
        pos - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        Returns:
        TRUE if this is an adjective (defined by POSCategory.ADJECTIVE).

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TRUE if this is an adverb (defined by POSCategory.ADVERB).

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TRUE if this is a verb (defined by POSCategory.VERB).

      • isPunctuationPOS

        public static boolean isPunctuationPOS(java.lang.String pos)
        Checks if the given Part of Speech is from the category Punctuation (lots of stuff).
        Parameters:
        pos - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        Returns:
        TRUE if this is punctuation (defined by POSCategory.PUNCTUATION).

      • getPOSCategory

        public static POSUtils.POSCategory getPOSCategory(java.lang.String pos)
        Returns the POS category of the given POS. Null in case of nullstring or empty string.
        Parameters:
        pos - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        Returns:
        POS Category ('OTHER' if none is found).

      • getPOSPrefix

        public static java.lang.String getPOSPrefix(java.lang.String pos)
        Give two first letters of POS. If the POS is not long enough, return POS itself.
        Parameters:
        pos - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        Returns:
        two first letters of POS.

      • haveSamePOSCategory

        public static boolean haveSamePOSCategory(java.lang.String pos1,
                                          java.lang.String pos2)
        Checks if the two POS are from the same category
        Parameters:
        pos1 - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        pos2 - Penn Treebank part-of-speech tag
        Returns:
        TRUE if cateogires are the same, FALSE otherwise.

      • isPunctuationWord

        public static boolean isPunctuationWord(java.lang.String word)
        Checks if a word is punctuation (dot, comma, parenthesis, ...).
        Parameters:
        word - The word to check (check surface form).
        Returns:
        true if the word contains no non-punctuation char, false in every other case (including null, empty String, ROOT)
